# HumanHandPoseObservation.JointName.indexTip

**Case**

A joint name that represents the tip of the index finger.

## Declaration

```swift
case indexTip
```

## Getting the index finger joint name

- **HumanHandPoseObservation.JointName.indexDIP**: A joint name that represents the index finger’s distal interphalangeal joint.
- **HumanHandPoseObservation.JointName.indexMCP**: A joint name that represents the index finger’s metacarpophalangeal joint.
- **HumanHandPoseObservation.JointName.indexPIP**: A joint name that represents the index finger’s proximal interphalangeal joint.
